condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Improved cross-sectoral coordination and public services, at national and subnational levels, to benefit child witnesses, victims and perpetrators.

description.narrative: UNICEF concentrated its efforts at the subnational level to strengthen the capacity of municipalities to respond to situations of violence, notably discrimination, racism, child labor sexual violence and homicides. Through different partnerships UNICEF designed training materials for professionals from the local child protection system and promoted capacity building activities across municipalities enrolled in the UNICEF SEAL initiative on the prevention and response to violence against children. In addition, UNICEF supported and provided technical assistance to four State Committees for preventing homicides against adolescents and supported cross-sectoral actions to prevent armed violence against children, including homicides. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:06/02/2020

title.narrative: Percentage of the 1924 municipalities participating in the Municipal Seal that reported non-custodial programmes to adolescents in conflict with the law (monitored through the full achievement of systemic result 15)
